Question: Throughout the campaign, Obama dominated caucuses, which the ____ campaign largely ignored organizing for.
Hints: This person and Obama each received over 17 million votes during the nomination process, with both breaking the previous record.
Once she decided to run, the ____s purchased a home in Chappaqua, New York, north of New York City, in September 1999.
Books praising this person did not sell nearly as well (other than the memoirs written by her and her husband).
